resources.string:
Hi, my name is Iulia. "
"I am a passionate, self-taught app developer, specialized in the Android and iOS platforms. "
"With great communication skills, my aim is to understand the client's needs and deliver the right product for the end users. "
"Having a learning mindset, my goal is to grow while building great software.

* Java "
"* Android Studio "
"* React Native "
"* Javascript "
"* WordPress (Bootstrap/PHP/HTML/CSS)

* Do It with Pomo - Task Tracking App "
"* Gardenia - Flower Shop with WooCommerce back-end "
"* Breathe App "
"* Motivational App "
"* Reflex Game "
"* Weather App

* LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/iuliapuiu/ "
